resume.title: Jack Hoyt
resume.objectives: Seeking a forward-thinking company to complement my skills as a mobile application developer. My aim is to gain more practical knowledge and experience in the Computer Science field by contributing in a team of software developers.

job.job_title: Mobile Application Development Intern at Assembly Co in Manchester, NH May 2015 - September 2015, May 2016 - August 2016
job.job_summary: Developed mobile applications used for company communication and planning by financial businesses in the Manchester, New Hampshire area as part of a team.
Refactored and programmed the code for a website built for Williamson's Finances to connect its customers to their information.

qualifications.education: Northeastern University Class of 2020, Computer Science B.S.
qualifications.additional_information: Programming experience in C++, C#, and Java
Member of Andover's Engineering Externship Club

report.p: This is a decent start, but check my inline comments for areas where the language can be improved (jb_summary section). Based on your use of the schema here, I'm not sure you fully understood your group's design (see notes above for specific instances). The main issue is the lack of headers and single job_summary element make the format of the rendered version difficult to read, an important aspect of the resume genre is ease of quick reading and clear demarcation of information. I could also imagine having more "additional information" since your other experience is limited--clubs? software experience? Etc.
